title: The Space movie
creator_credit: Tony Palmer, Simon Draper and Richard Branson
brief_description: The Space Movie contains footage especially made available by NASA and the US National Archive, and includes never before seen colour film of the lunar landscape, man’s historic first walk on the moon, Mars, Venus and beyond. Music by Mike Oldfield.
creator_credit_for_label: Tony Palmer, Simon Draper and Richard Branson
